description: This table contains information about the procedure modifiers associated with each procedure in AUT_PROC_DETAILS. It extracts the related multiple response Procedure Modifiers item. Each row in this table relates to a parent row in AUT_PROC_DETAILS. Join to it using the AUTH_ID columns and AUT_PROC_DETAILS.LINE = GROUP_LINE.

columns.name: AUTH_ID
columns.description: The authorization ID for the authorization record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: PROC_MOD_ID
columns.description: Modifier which applies to the procedure being authorized. Modifiers are extracted to the CLARITY_MOD table.

columns.name: PROC_MOD_ID_MODIFIER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the modifier record.
